title: SenTient Feedback Correction Record
description: A record of a manual user override where the AI's high-confidence match was rejected. Used for reinforcement learning and model tuning.

id.description: Unique identifier for this feedback event.

project_id.description: The ID of the project where this correction occurred.

surface_form.description: The raw cell value that was being reconciled (e.g., 'Paris').

context_window.description: The surrounding N-Grams or words used by Falcon to make the decision.

rejected_id.description: The Wikidata QID the AI selected (e.g., 'Q90'). Null if AI found nothing.

accepted_id.description: The Wikidata QID the User selected (e.g., 'Q167646'). Null if User decided it's a new item.

telemetry.description: Internal scores at the moment of failure.

ai_score.description: The Consensus Score the AI assigned to the rejected candidate.

model_version.description: The version of SenTient running during the error (e.g., '1.0.0-RC1').

user_comment.description: Optional free-text explanation from the user.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the correction was applied.
